Content.Text:
<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hullo. It's nice to meet you. This is the Trade
Depot Information Desk. How may I help you?

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hullo. Welcome to the Trade Depot Information
Desk.

There's a festival today, so the Information Desk
is closed.

It's outside of business hours. The Information
Desk is closed.
I wonder what this place is for...

Maybe I could check the Recommended
Shipping List.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm afraid there aren't any requests right now.

<NAME_MOB_JONNY>
Nice to meet you. My name is Jack.
<PAGE>
Jonas asks me to mind this desk for him on
Sundays and during festivals.
<PAGE>
I can help you the same way he can, so please
feel free to ask me anything you'd ask him.
<PAGE>
So...welcome to the Trade Depot Information
Desk!

<NAME_MOB_JONNY>
Welcome to the Trade Depot Information Desk.

<NAME_MOB_JONNY>
There aren't any requests right now.
